top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
Instructors are an obstacle between you and a grade.

I think its the best way to stay yourself most of the time. Being too flexible about other people, especially during school, will form your personality to become rather submissive in life. Instructors are there for us, that is their job

I am like a chameleon. No problem at all in adapting to my professors’ leftist urges. Keep your eyes on the prize, which is to say keep focussing on getting a good grade – – after which you can laugh at all these puffed-up Marxists earning $150,000 a year.
